document.full_text: oil prices rose to their highest since 2008 on monday, with brent surging above $121 a barrel as nigerian election delays and a short-lived strike in gabon joined a list of geopolitical supply concerns.
document.title: oil climbs to highest since 2008 on supply concerns
lines_and_colors: oil prices rose to their highest since 2008 on monday, with brent surging above $121 a barrel as nigerian election delays and a short-lived strike in gabon joined a list of geopolitical supply concerns.
